snippet: Like other bitcoin evangelists, Ken Shishido is ready to write off the money he lost in the bankruptcy of Tokyo-based virtual currency exchange Mt. Gox as the price of revolutionizing global finance....

headline.print_headline: Bitcoin True Believers Unfazed by Losses in Mt. Gox Collapse
headline.main: Bitcoin True Believers Unfazed by Losses in Mt. Gox Collapse

lead_paragraph: Like other bitcoin evangelists, Ken Shishido is ready to write off the money he lost in the bankruptcy of Tokyo-based virtual currency exchange Mt. Gox as the price of revolutionizing global finance.
